import '../../Login/Login.css' import { useState, } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import React from 'react' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' function Login() { const [email, setEmail] = useState('') const [password, setPassword] = useState('') const [errMessage, setErrMessage] = useState('') const dispatch = useDispatch() async function handleAdminLogin() { let data = await axios.post("/admin/login", { email, password }) console.log('hiiiiiiiiiii') console.log('data.........',data.err) if (data.error) { setErrMessage(data.message) } else{ dispatch({ type: "refresh" }) setMessage('') } } return (
